resources.string: Perform the 30 second chair stand test. Start seated, then stand up and sit down as many times as you can in 30 seconds. There will be a sound and vibration at the start and the end of the test.
Place the phone in your right pocket and stand quietly with good posture for 30 seconds. There will be a sound and vibration at the start and the end of the test.
Please put your phone in your side pocket.
Please put your phone in your side pocket.
The static test will begin in:
